body.p:
With the Fine-tune Jobs panel you can create new models, by using a process called fine tuning.
Press New Fine-tune Job. A dialog is displayed.
In the dialog, you can choose to create a model starting from a base one (see the Base model combo box), that is trained over the text of XML, TXT, Markdown, PDF files:
from the current project
from a specified folder Or:
from a file containing lots of "prompt"/"completion" examples in a JSONL format. This file may be created by a tool, or manually, and the training results in better models.
Once you press Start Fine tune job the job starts, and it will be listed in the Fine-tune Jobs panel.
To check the job progress, you can press the Refresh button - the Status column will be updated. Another way is to use the contextual menu, the Job Events item. Once a job has finished, you can press Refresh in the Model panel and you will find the name of the new model in the combo box.
